Description:
Monitor and alert on conditional access changes where non approved actor removed CA Policy.

Author: Corissa Koopmans, '@corissalea'
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: CA Policy Removed by Non Approved Actor
Query: sourcetype='azure-auditlogs' eql select * from _source_ where properties.message = 'delete conditional access policy'
